title: feat: account API improvements + authorize page restyle
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: The authorization page receives a sleek visual overhaul matching the dashboard's green theme, while the Account API now provides profile avatars and granular balance breakdowns.
gist.impact: Users enjoy a smoother, more consistent login experience, and developers can now display user avatars and distinguish between free tier and paid credit balances.
gist.visual_concept: Identity and Balance. The bee checking a new ID card and inventory stats. Represents the profile image and balance breakdown.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee holding a shiny new pixelated ID card with a profile picture. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Behind the bee, a retro game UI displays 'Tier' and 'Pack' balance bars like health and mana. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like Stardew Valley inventory screen. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
